answers.answer: Hello,Masturbation has no permanent effect on the size of the penis and the srotum. If a man gets erected, his penis will fill with blood and grow in size. Impotence can be due to physical, psychological causes or a combination of both. Physical impotence can be due to an imperfect blood supply to the penis, an age-related loss of male sex hormones, diabetes or high blood sugar levels, medical drugs, or various neurological conditions. Psychological factors like lack of confidence, desire, depression, or fear of failure can cause impotence. Seeking the opinion of a physician and a counselor may be helpful. Keep me posted.Take care and regards!

question: I am a 23yr old male and i am unmarried. I used to masturbate once-twice a day from last 4 years.Now i notice   that my scrotum(balls) now becomes empty or you can say it becomes weak. so i want ot ask how could i regain strength of my penis balls??So that i won't face any problem further??Suggest me any medicine,food habits,etc which help me to regain my penis strength????
title: How to Regain Penis Strength????
